d2_dictionary.title: This dictionary is used to enable governing parent virtual document object IDs to be mapped to the corresponding document object names in property pages, as and where appropriate
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
d2_dictionary.dql: select r_object_id as name, object_name as label_en from cd_controlled_doc(all) where r_object_id = '$value(governing_parent_vdoc_id)'
